verses.verse: <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We will <S%H398>eat<s%> our own <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H3847>wear<s%> our own <S%H8071>clothing:<s%> only let us be <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%> Take <S%H622>away<s%> our <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>"

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6780>branch<s%> will be <S%H6643>beautiful<s%> and <S%H3519>glorious,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> will be the <S%H1347>beauty<s%> and glory <S%H8597>of<s%> the <S%H6413>survivors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It will <S%H7604>happen,<s%> that he who is left in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and he who <S%H3498>remains<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> even everyone who is <S%H3789>written<s%> among the <S%H2416>living<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

when the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have washed <S%H7364>away<s%> the <S%H6675>filth<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and shall have <S%H1740>purged<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from its <S%H7130>midst,<s%> by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1197>burning.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1254>create<s%> over the whole <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and over her <S%H4744>assemblies,<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H6227>smoke<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> for over all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> will be a <S%H2646>canopy.<s%>

There will be a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> for a <S%H6738>shade<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat,<s%> and for a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and for a <S%H4563>shelter<s%> from <S%H2230>storm<s%> and from <S%H4306>rain.<s%>
